mapper.insert: insert into pilipili.category (pilipili.category.id, pilipili.category.parent, pilipili.category.name, pilipili.category.sort) values (#{id},#{parent},#{name},#{sort})
mapper.update: UPDATE pilipili.category t SET t.parent = #{parent},t.name = #{name},t.sort = #{sort} WHERE t.id LIKE #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM pilipili.category t ORDER BY sort
